title: Legends of the Space Marines
description: Space Marines and their evil counterparts, the Traitor Marines, epitomise the wartorn. Warhammer 40,000 universe. This short story collection focuses entirely on these superhuman warrior, telling high-action tales of heroism and savagery. Combining the talents of Black Library favorite authors such as Mike Lee and Nick Kyme with hot new talent, this collection is not to be missed
author: Christian Z. Dunn
